Name: [center]Baker[/center]
Text: [center]Oh hello litte Redcap? What can I do for you?[/center]

Name: [center]Lil Red Cap[/center]
Text: [center]I need some Bread for my Grandma.[/center]

Name: [center]Baker[/center]
Text: [center]I sadly dont have any of my special flour left. Would you be so nice and go get it for me?[/center]
